GeneDef.label: switcher
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are able to rewrite their genetic code to the closest similar one, allowing them to switch between specific xenotypes.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Allows to <color=#8a8ae6>switch</color> between <color=#8a8ae6>xenotypes</color> that have this gene.
<color=#ffec85>Can only switch within its own heredity type (endogene/xenogene).</color>
<color=#f46d6b>Does not store information about previous genes in any form.</color>
